So i dont think any of you remember but a couple months ago i had a operation in my stomach for some kind of kidney failure. All was good but recently i went to the doctors and just got the results that i have to go on a serious diet to recover. And I'll be having ANOTHER operation. This will probably reduce the amount i play by alot. So just lettin you know...
wish me luck for the op! xD
